name: Bitdream
description:
As Alice was going to sleep one day, she wakes up - and finds herself in another world!

Get her home before the timer runs out - you only have 500 seconds! Do you think you can do it? (P.S, you better, otherwise she'll miss dinner. And be stuck there forever. It'll all be on you. Your fault.)

Double-tap SPACE to Double Jump.

X to Shoot.

A - D Move Keys.

Made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022. Have fun!
